        public static void driveDistance(double speed,

        Drive until a distance is reached
        Parameters:
        speed - The speed to drive at
        turnMagnitude - How much to turn
        aDistance - How far to drive on the first motor
        bDistance - How much to drive on the second motor
        encoderA - The first Encoder
        encoderB - the second Encoder
        drive - The RobotDrive to use
